channel.title: Retail & Specialty Shops on Business Directory
channel.description: Recent content in Retail & Specialty Shops on Business Directory

item.title: Quality Fresh Vegetables
item.description:
About Us

Quality Fresh Vegetables offers a wide selection of the freshest, locally sourced vegetables to enhance your meals. Our commitment to quality and sustainability ensures that you receive only the best produce, straight from the farm to your table.

Our Services

  • Fresh Vegetables: Wide variety of locally sourced vegetables
  • Quality Produce: Farm-fresh vegetables for all your needs

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Youdistri Ramjattan
  • Phone: 799-5705

item.title: Jenny's Perfume N' Things
item.description:
About Us

Jenny’s Perfume N’ Things offers a curated selection of original perfumes, stylish clothing, trendy handbags, exquisite jewelry, and unique gift items. With a focus on quality and individuality, we provide a shopping experience that caters to diverse tastes and preferences.

Our Services

  • Original Perfumes: Authentic fragrances and perfumes
  • Fashion Clothing: Stylish and trendy clothing collection
  • Designer Handbags: Selection of fashionable handbags
  • Jewelry Collection: Exquisite jewelry pieces for all occasions
  • Gift Items: Unique and thoughtful gift selections

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Jenny Ramkhalawan
  • Phone: 346-2376 / 476-0258
  • Email: jennysperfume@gmail.com, flygrljn@aol.com

item.title: Shoe Lab
item.description:
About Us

Shoe Lab specializes in high-quality leather crafts and expert shoe repair services. With a commitment to craftsmanship and customer satisfaction, we breathe new life into your favorite footwear and offer bespoke leather goods tailored to your style.

Our Services

  • Leather Crafts: High-quality handcrafted leather goods and accessories
  • Shoe Repair: Expert repair and restoration of all types of footwear
  • Bespoke Leather Goods: Custom-made leather items tailored to your specifications

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Andy Samaroo
  • Phone: 782-5643
  • Email: andysamaroo09@gmail.com

item.title: H.Lallas Hardware and Automotive Shop
item.description:
About Us

H.Lallas Hardware and Automotive Shop offers a wide range of hardware supplies and automotive repair materials. With a focus on quality and customer service, we provide everything you need for your DIY projects and vehicle maintenance.

Our Services

  • Hardware Supplies: Comprehensive range of quality hardware supplies for all your needs
  • Automotive Repair Materials: Specialized materials and parts for vehicle repairs and maintenance
  • DIY Project Assistance: Expert guidance and materials for your DIY projects
  • Vehicle Maintenance Supplies: Essential supplies and materials for regular vehicle maintenance

Contact Information

  • Contact Person: Michelle Lalla
  • Phone: 6777574
  • Email: Michelle_la@hotmail.com
